See also: firma, firmá, firmà, and fîrma

German[edit]

German Wikipedia has an article on:
Firma
Wikipedia de

Etymology[edit]

Borrowed from Italian firma. Cognate with English firm.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • (Standard, Germany) IPA(key): /fɪrma/, [ˈfɪʁ.mä], [ˈfɪɐ̯.mä]
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Firma f (genitive Firma, plural Firmen)

  1. A company, a business.
  2. (specialist, law, economics) A firm, the name under which a company operates, as opposed to the actual legal entity.

Derived terms[edit]

  • Briefkastenfirma
